publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-30 Jeremy Purvis: Broomhill Day Centre, Penicuik—That the Parliament notes the excellent and consistent standard of care provided by the Broomhill Day Centre in Penicuik; commends the dedicated staff and volunteers for their work over many years in establishing the centre as an example of high quality day care facilities in Scotland; is concerned at the precarious nature of its funding for 2003-04 which could jeopardise this standard of care, and calls on all funding bodies to ensure that the centre’s funding is secure.
